change_description: Instead index withIntPoint,LongPoint,FloatPoint,DoublePoint, and create range queries withIntPoint.newRangeQuery(),LongPoint.newRangeQuery(),FloatPoint.newRangeQuery(),DoublePoint.newRangeQuery()respectively. SeePointValuesfor background information on Points.
This class is outdated and no longer used since Lucene 2.9. Nuke it finally!
This comparator is only a transition mechanism
Use of this method can only lead to race conditions. Try to actually obtain a lock instead.
Only for reading existing formats. Encode maps withDataOutput.writeSetOfStrings(Set)instead.
Only for reading existing formats. Encode maps withDataOutput.writeMapOfStrings(Map)instead.

change_id: 6.0.1_org.apache.lucene.search.join.JoinUtil.createJoinQuery(String, boolean, String, FieldType.LegacyNumericType, Query, IndexSearcher, ScoreMode)
change_description: BecauseFieldType.LegacyNumericTypeis deprecated, instead useJoinUtil.createJoinQuery(String, boolean, String, Class, Query, IndexSearcher, ScoreMode)Method for query time joining for numeric fields. It supports multi- and single- values longs and ints. All considerations fromJoinUtil.createJoinQuery(String, boolean, String, Query, IndexSearcher, ScoreMode)are applicable here too, though memory consumption might be higher.
source_element_name: org.apache.lucene.search.join.JoinUtil.createJoinQuery(String, boolean, String, FieldType.LegacyNumericType, Query, IndexSearcher, ScoreMode)

JoinUtil.createJoinQuery(String, boolean, String, Query, IndexSearcher, ScoreMode)

change_description: Index with Points instead and usePointsConfig
Index with Points instead and usePointsConfigListener
Index with Points instead and usePointQueryNodeinstead.
Index with Points instead and usePointRangeQueryNodeinstead.
(March 2011) Not normally used, to be removed from Lucene 4.0. This class implementing Comparable is to be removed at the same time.
Type for a GeoPointField that is not stored: normalization factors, frequencies, and positions are omitted.
Type for a stored GeoPointField: normalization factors, frequencies, and positions are omitted.
encodes prefix and full resolution terms - use withLegacyNumericTokenStream
Migrate to one of the newer suggesters which are much more RAM efficient.
Migrate to one of the newer suggesters which are much more RAM efficient.
only exists to be overridden by old codecs that didnt support this
only for Only available to ancient codecs can limit this to the subset of types they support.
